channel.title: MoparScape connection
channel.description:
Hello,
I remember a long time ago when I used to play MoparScape. It was my favorite thing in the world. Today, I remembered it. So I look it up, and here it is. Unfortunately, every time I try to log in, the game logs in for about 5 seconds, then goes back to the screen with "New Server" and "Enter" or something like that. I am really sad, and I want to play the game. This happens with every server. It says "Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36". Any help?

item.title: MoparScape connection
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“MacAttack, post:9, topic:348595”]Ok. I am a total noob, so how do I download a client?[/quote]on the status page 9/10 servers provide you with a link to download it…

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape connection
item.dc:creator: @MacAttack MacAttack
item.description:
@MacAttack wrote:

Ok. I am a total noob, so how do I download a client?

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape connection
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

There is a chance you are logging into a server which has items which aren’t supported in your client. You’ll need to download the specific client for that server, or use a client that can support the server.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape connection
item.dc:creator: @MacAttack MacAttack
item.description:
@MacAttack wrote:

First of all, thanks for all your help. But second, I don’t understand it. How do I check if my client and server match?

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape connection
item.dc:creator: @halolouis halolouis
item.description:
@halolouis wrote:

Hmm. Well here is my suggestion. Make sure your client and server match. lol duh. Then find the newest version of jre and jdk for client and
server respectively. Dl it and remove old one. If it doesn’t work I will try to help you to connect to a specific server so we can figure this out.
Also if it doesn’t work message msn if u have one.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape connection
item.dc:creator: @MacAttack MacAttack
item.description:
@MacAttack wrote:

The IP Changer doesn’t work, but the client does. But only when I start HybridScape and a new server. Any other suggestions?

I’ve found someone else with the same problem, and this is what they said:

[Quote]Well i’ve been trying to get around this but just can’t. I pick a server and all and i make a name, and i log in, but before it fully logs in, it redirects me back to the login screen.

What exactly comes up:
Error: T2 - 126,253,253 - 24,0,0 - 83,116,97,116,117,115,58,32,78,111,114,109,97,108,38,80,108,97,121,101,114,10,90,79

that… all on 1 line though. Someone please tell what this is and how to solve it[/Quote]

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape connection

item.description:
@halolouis wrote:

Server downloads… This 1 should work http://www.megaupload.com/?d=Z72DM00S

item.description:
@MacAttack wrote:

Sorry, but what am I supposed to download? The client? Where can I find that?

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape connection
item.dc:creator: @halolouis halolouis
item.description:
@halolouis wrote:

FireWall? hmm. Try dling both ip changer and some1s client. Connect to both. If neither connect could be java
or firewall. lol idk what else would do that

Read full topic
